event.description: Cesar Hernandez grounds out, second baseman Jose Peraza to first baseman Joey Votto.
Howie Kendrick walks.
Odubel Herrera grounds into a force out, shortstop Zack Cozart to second baseman Jose Peraza. Howie Kendrick out at 2nd. Odubel Herrera to 1st.
Maikel Franco singles on a sharp line drive to center fielder Billy Hamilton. Odubel Herrera to 2nd.
Tommy Joseph flies out to center fielder Billy Hamilton.
